response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe is an excellent fit for your needs and expectations. This product is valued at $1,200,000 to you, and we are excited to offer it to you today. Considering its high value and exceptional quality, I would like to propose a special introductory price of $1,100,000 for you. This exclusive offer is valid for a limited time only, so I encourage you to respond promptly if you are interested. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. I look forward to the possibility of serving you with this remarkable product. Warm regards, Alice", "product_price": 1100000}
